name: IMU_ANGULAR_RATE
contents: ang_rate_x: uint16, ang_rate_y: uint16, ang_rate_z: uint16
description: Inertial Measurement Unit x,y,z-axis angular rate value. 0.01dps per bit, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, signed

name: IMU_ACCELERATION
contents: accel_x: uint16, accel_y: uint16, accel_z: uint16
description: Inertial Measurement Unit x,y,z-axis acceleration value. 0.01g per bit, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, signed

name: IRTS_FL_0
contents: channel1: uint16, channel2: uint16, channel3: uint16, channel4: uint16
description: Front Left wheel InfraRed Temperature Sensor data, channels 1 through 4. 0.1˚C per bit, -100˚C offset, Big-Endian, 16bit Total, unsigned.

name: GPS_COORDS
contents: latitude: float32, longitude: float32
description: Coordinates received from GPS

name: GPS_SPEED
contents: speed: uint16
description: Speed received from GPS

name: LAP_COUNT
contents: lap_count: uint8, timestamp: uint32
description: Lap counter and associated timestamp

name: STEER_VERSION
contents: component_version: uint8, cancicd_version: uint8
description: periodic message containing current can definitions version; one every 1000 ms

name: DAS_VERSION
contents: component_version: uint8, cancicd_version: uint8
description: periodic message containing current can definitions version; one every 1000 ms

name: HV_VERSION
contents: component_version: uint8, cancicd_version: uint8
description: periodic message containing current can definitions version; one every 1000 ms

name: LV_VERSION
contents: component_version: uint8, cancicd_version: uint8
description: periodic message containing current can definitions version; one every 1000 ms

name: TLM_VERSION
contents: component_version: uint8, cancicd_version: uint8
description: periodic message containing current can definitions version; one every 1000 ms

name: TIMESTAMP
contents: timestamp: uint32

name: SET_TLM_STATUS
contents: tlm_status_set: OFF, ON, race_type: ACCELERATION, SKIDPAD, AUTOCROSS, ENDURANCE, driver: uint8, circuit: uint8
description: Ask telemetry to turn on/off and send a tuple containing the currenttest, driver, map(soon implemented; only once

name: TLM_STATUS
contents: tlm_status: ON, OFF, race_type: ACCELERATION, SKIDPAD, AUTOCROSS, ENDURANCE, driver: uint8, circuit: uint8
description: The answer to the steering wheels message that changes the status of the telemetry; one every 1000 ms

name: STEER_SYSTEM_STATUS
contents: soc_temp: uint8
description: System stats of the raspberry pi inside the steering wheel; one every 2000 ms

name: HV_VOLTAGE
contents: pack_voltage: uint16, bus_voltage: uint16, max_cell_voltage: uint16, min_cell_voltage: uint16
description: Pack stats; one every 20 ms

name: HV_CURRENT
contents: current: int16, power: int16
description: Current supplied by the pack; one every 20 ms

name: HV_TEMP
contents: average_temp: uint16, max_temp: uint16, min_temp: uint16
description: Cell temperatures; one every 20 ms

name: HV_ERRORS
contents: warnings: Hv_Errors, errors: Hv_Errors
description: Battery-related errors; if there are, one every 20 ms

name: TS_STATUS
contents: ts_status: OFF, PRECHARGE, ON, FATAL
description: BMS status; one every 20 ms

name: SET_TS_STATUS
contents: ts_status_set: OFF, ON
description: Requests a TS status; only once

name: STEER_STATUS
contents: traction_control: OFF, SLIP_CONTROL, TORQUE_VECTORING, COMPLETE, map: R, D20, D40, D60, D80, D100
description: Send update of the tuneable values from the steering wheel; one every 100 ms

name: SET_CAR_STATUS
contents: car_status_set: IDLE, RUN
description: Ask to DAS to change car status; only once

name: SET_PEDALS_RANGE
contents: bound: SET_MAX, SET_MIN, pedal: ACCELERATOR, BRAKE
description: Ask to calibrate pedals and steer in x_START, x_END steps; only once

name: CAR_STATUS
contents: Inverter_status: inverter_l: OFF, IDLE, ON, Inverter_status: inverter_r: OFF, IDLE, ON, car_status: IDLE, SETUP, RUN
description: Car status, all states managed by the DAS will be send (car status, inverters status); one every 100 ms

name: LV_CURRENT
contents: current: uint8
description: Current of LV battery pack: total current taken from the battery itself; one every 500 ms

name: LV_VOLTAGE
contents: total_voltage: uint16, voltage_1: uint8, voltage_2: uint8, voltage_3: uint8, voltage_4: uint8
description: Voltages of LV battery pack: total voltage 16 bit 12,17.2V (0x0000 under_voltage,0xFFFF over_voltage), 4x single cell voltage 8bit 3,4.2V 0.005mV/bit (no additional info, 0x000 is 3V 0xFFFF is 4.2V); one every 200 ms

name: LV_TEMPERATURE
contents: bp_temperature: uint16, dcdc_temperature: uint8
description: Temperature of LV battery pack,0,80Celsius, uint8 0.32C/bit. battery pack and dcdc converter; one every 200 ms

name: COOLING_STATUS
contents: hv_fan_speed: uint8, lv_fan_speed: uint8, pump_speed: uint8
description: Percentage value 0% to 100% of bms_hv_fans, bms_lv_fans, pump_speed, 8bit; one every 1000 ms

name: HV_CELLS_VOLTAGE
contents: cell_index: uint8, voltage_0: uint16, voltage_1: uint16, voltage_2: uint16
description: Voltages for each cell; one every 200 ms

name: HV_CELLS_TEMP
contents: cell_index: uint8, temp_0: uint8, temp_1: uint8, temp_2: uint8, temp_3: uint8, temp_4: uint8, temp_5: uint8, temp_6: uint8
description: Cell temperatures; one every 100 ms

name: HV_CELL_BALANCING_STATUS
contents: balancing_status: ON, OFF
description: Cell balancing status; one every 500 ms

name: SET_CELL_BALANCING_STATUS
contents: set_balancing_status: OFF, ON
description: Set cell balancing status; only once

name: HANDCART_STATUS
contents: connected: bool
description: Sends updates on the presence of the handcart; one every 500 ms

name: SPEED
contents: encoder_r: uint16, encoder_l: uint16, inverter_r: uint16, inverter_l: uint16
description: Encoder speed and inverter RPMs; one every ? ms
